medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has experienced abdominal pain since yesterday morning around 8 AM (approximately 19 hours ago), which began right after breakfast. The pain was described as being much worse prior to receiving morphine and is located to the right of the umbilicus with some radiation to the right lower quadrant (RLQ). There are no accompanying fevers, nausea, vomiting, or diarrhea.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Prostate cancer (status post radiation), Insulin Dependent Diabetes Mellitus (DM), Hypertension (HTN). Past surgical history includes tonsillectomy.
